column2: SELECT Q.BestObjID as Quasar_candidate_ID , G.ObjID as Galaxy_ID, N.distance into mydb.MyTable from SpecObj       	as Q, 		         Neighbors       as N,		 	Galaxy          as G,		         SpecClass  	as SC,		         SpecLine        as L, 		    	SpecLineNames   as LN 		   WHERE Q.SpecClass =SC.value	  	     and SC.name  in (&&&, &&&) 	     and Q.SpecObjID = L.SpecObjID	     and L.LineID = LN.value		     and LN.Name != &&& 		     and L.ew < #			     and Q.BestObjID = N.ObjID		     and G.ObjID = N.NeighborObjID  	     and N.distance < #/#
